Name: system_ligand_validation_num_residues
Description: Number of residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_num_processed_residues
Description: Number of processed residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_processed_residues
Description: Percentage of processed residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_average_rsr
Description: Average Real-Space R-value across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_average_rsrz
Description: Average Real-Space R-value Z-score across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_average_rscc
Description: Average Real-Space Correlation Coefficient across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_average_occupancy
Description: Average occupancy across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_rsr_under_threshold
Description: Percentage of residues with RSR under the threshold

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_rscc_over_threshold
Description: Percentage of residues with RSCC over the threshold

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_occupancy_over_threshold
Description: Percentage of residues with occupancy over the threshold

Name: system_ligand_validation_average_b_factor
Description: Average B factor across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_unknown_residue_count
Description: Number of unknown residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_atom_count
Description: Number of atoms across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_heavy_atom_count
Description: Number of heavy atoms across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_num_unresolved_heavy_atoms
Description: Number of unresolved heavy atoms across all residues in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_max_alt_count
Description: The highest number of configurations in a single residue in the list

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_outliers_chirality
Description: Percent outliers for chirality

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_outliers_clashes
Description: Percent outliers for clashes

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_outliers_density
Description: Percent outliers for density

Name: system_ligand_validation_percent_outliers_geometry
Description: Percent outliers for geometry
